actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide an additional payment under part A of the medicare program for the operating costs of inpatient hospital services of hospitals with a high proportion of patients who are medicare beneficiaries.
short_title: High Medicare Hospital Relief Act of 1990

summary.text: High Medicare Hospital Relief Act of 1990 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide, from FY 1990 through 1992, an additional Medicare payment to a hospital when at least 65 percent of its inpatient days or discharges are attributable to Medicare beneficiaries.

titles.title: High Medicare Hospital Relief Act of 1990

A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide an additional payment under part A of the medicare program for the operating costs of inpatient hospital services of hospitals with a high proportion of patients who are medicare beneficiaries.
